reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are so cute! Bought for a gift & she loves it! Easy to use & fun for the younger ones!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great speech therapy toy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely useful for classrooms/gifts
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for my niece and they are a great alternative to Legos. I will have a classroom soon, and plan to purchase these again for my classroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Imaginative
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice toy. The pieces are well made and provide a lot of options for making different shapes of the garden and different designs of the flowers. There are two negatives: the butterflies broke after a few weeks (the wings broke off at the center) and the bag, which is a great idea and perfect for storing the pieces, is made of very flimsy fabric and tore at the seam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a present for my niece’s 4th birthday party and she screamed (with joy) when she opened the gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love that these are like blocks but not. It's something kids can build and play with but different than what they are used to. Would also be great for teaching the parts of a flower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These flowers are BEAUTIFUL!
reviews.reviewText: Being a stay at home mom, I constantly try to find different things for my toddler to do. We have a gazillion different art drawing boards. It was time we find something other than drawing. This set was my great find. The pieces are very nice quality. It’s a very entertaining and educational activity for my kid to build these flowers. They are also beautiful. I can use them as decorations. It also came with a travel tote bag which was great for storing and pieces. I totally will buy this set as gifts for other toddlers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great rainy day activity
reviews.reviewText: Had so much fun building our own garden. Endless possibilities and so easy to build, take apart, ands build again. Cute and just as colorful and bright as a really garden. The box pictures don't do it justice. Was fun building with our 5 year old on a rainy day when we couldn't play in the real garden this was a great alternative that we will definitely have many more rainy days of entertainment.
Arrived on time as described. Great for kids to play. Keep’s entertainment for a longtime. Good size pieces. Maybe too small for very young toddlers.
